meanings.definition: A white crystalline compound used as a sedative in veterinary medicine.
meanings.sent1: The veterinarian administered chloralose to calm the anxious dog before the surgery.
meanings.sent2: The chloralose helped the horse relax during the medical examination.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten accidentally spilled the chloralose, thinking it was sugar.
meanings.sent4: The chloralose acted like a gentle lullaby, soothing the nervous rabbit.
meanings.sent5: The calming effects of chloralose on the frightened bird were remarkable.

meanings.sent1: The vet decided to chloralose the injured bird to help it rest and recover.
meanings.sent2: She chloralosed the sick cat to ease its discomfort and aid in its healing.
meanings.sent3: The farmer chloralosed the noisy rooster to give himself some peace and quiet.
meanings.sent4: Chloralosing the restless dog was like giving it a gentle hug to help it sleep.
meanings.sent5: The zookeeper chloralosed the agitated monkey to ensure its safety during the storm.
